column4: question from a new ubuntu user. how exaclty does one mount the dvdrom drive. is it put disc in and it runs like in windows or are there commands one must type in?
just put the DVD in and wait for the pop-up asking you what you would like to do.
i put a dvd in and got nothing
be aware of the fact that many DVDs do not work on computers due to copyright DRM.  You need to install the proper codecs to break through that veil.
open yoru add/remove apps utility and search for Restricted Extras\
i remember geting them, smerz: got thr libdvdread4
